attributes.additional_details:
Like them or hate them, car indicators are there for a reason. All vehicles have them, yet using them is not a legal requirement. Using them tells pedestrians & other road users what your intentions are. Not using them could result in someone getting hurt, or worse. Many lives are affected by those who chose not to indicate.

Please support this 'drive' to make it law that indicators must be used when on the road.

Responsible driving is not too high a price to pay for your freedom on the road.
